mapper.sql: CASE_ID, SUITE_ID, METHOD_ADDRESS, CASE_DES, CASE_DATA, CASE_ASSERT_TYPE, CASE_ASSERT_VALUE, BEFORE_RUN, AFTER_RUN, CASE_RUN_NUM, IS_DEL
mapper.insert: insert into TEST_CASE (SUITE_ID, METHOD_ADDRESS, CASE_DES, CASE_DATA, CASE_ASSERT_TYPE, CASE_ASSERT_VALUE, BEFORE_RUN, AFTER_RUN, CASE_RUN_NUM, IS_DEL) values (#{suite_id}, #{method_address}, #{case_des}, #{case_data}, #{case_assert_type}, #{case_assert_value}, #{before_run}, #{after_run}, #{case_run_num}, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT A.CASE_ID,A.SUITE_ID,B.SUITE_DES,A.METHOD_ADDRESS,A.CASE_DES,A.CASE_DATA,A.CASE_ASSERT_TYPE,A.CASE_ASSERT_VALUE,A.BEFORE_RUN,A.AFTER_RUN,A.CASE_RUN_NUM,A.IS_DEL FROM TEST_CASE A, TEST_SUITE B A.SUITE_ID = B.SUITE_ID AND A.IS_DEL = 0 AND B.IS_DEL = 0
AND A.CASE_ID = #{case_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.CASE_ID,A.SUITE_ID,B.SUITE_DES,A.METHOD_ADDRESS,A.CASE_DES,A.CASE_DATA,A.CASE_ASSERT_TYPE,A.CASE_ASSERT_VALUE,A.BEFORE_RUN,A.AFTER_RUN,A.CASE_RUN_NUM,A.IS_DEL FROM TEST_CASE A,TEST_SUITE B,TEST_METHOD C A.SUITE_ID = B.SUITE_ID AND B.METHOD_ID = C.METHOD_ID AND A.IS_DEL = 0 AND B.IS_DEL = 0 AND C.IS_DEL = 0
AND C.METHOD_ID = #{method_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.CASE_ID,A.SUITE_ID,B.SUITE_DES,A.METHOD_ADDRESS,A.CASE_DES,A.CASE_DATA,A.CASE_ASSERT_TYPE,A.CASE_ASSERT_VALUE,A.BEFORE_RUN,A.AFTER_RUN,A.CASE_RUN_NUM,A.IS_DEL FROM TEST_CASE A,TEST_SUITE B,TEST_METHOD C, TEST_SERVICE D A.SUITE_ID = B.SUITE_ID AND B.METHOD_ID = C.METHOD_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND A.IS_DEL = 0 AND B.IS_DEL = 0 AND C.IS_DEL = 0 AND D.IS_DEL = 0
AND D.SERVICE_ID = #{service_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.CASE_ID,A.SUITE_ID,B.SUITE_DES,A.METHOD_ADDRESS,A.CASE_DES,A.CASE_DATA,A.CASE_ASSERT_TYPE,A.CASE_ASSERT_VALUE,A.BEFORE_RUN,A.AFTER_RUN,A.CASE_RUN_NUM,A.IS_DEL FROM TEST_CASE A, TEST_SUITE B A.SUITE_ID = B.SUITE_ID AND A.IS_DEL = 0 AND B.IS_DEL = 0
